dropdownStatus() dropdownStatusCommonITILObject CommonITILObjectdropdownStatus
static dropdownStatus (array $options = [] )[static]
Dropdown of object status
Depuis
0.84 new proto
Paramètres
$options
array of options
name : select name (default is status)
value : default value (default self::INCOMING)
showtype : list proposed : normal, search or allowed (default normal)
display : boolean if false get string
Renvoie
string|integer Output string if display option is set to false, otherwise random part of dropdown id

getActorsForType() getActorsForTypeCommonITILObject CommonITILObjectgetActorsForType
getActorsForType (int $actortype = 1 , array $params = [] )
Return the list of actors for a given actor type We try to retrieve them by:
in case new ticket
from virtual _actor field (present after a reload)
from template (predefined actor field)
from default actor if setting is defined in user preference
for existing ticket (with an id > 0), directly from saved actors
Depuis
10.0
Paramètres
int$actortype
1=requester, 2=assign, 3=observer
array$params
posted data of itil object
Renvoie
array of actors

getEntitiesForRequesters() getEntitiesForRequestersCommonITILObject CommonITILObjectgetEntitiesForRequesters
getEntitiesForRequesters (array $params = [] )
Retrieve all possible entities for an itilobject posted data. We try to retrieve requesters in the data:
from _users_id_requester (data from template or default actor)
from _actors (virtual field when the form is reloaded) By default, if none of these fields are present, entities are get from current active entity.

10.0
Paramètres
array$params
posted data by an itil object
Renvoie
array of possible entities_id

getTimelineItems (array $options = [] )
Retrieves all timeline items for this ITILObject
Paramètres
array$options
Possible options:
with_documents : include documents elements
with_logs : include log entries
with_validations : include validation elements
sort_by_date_desc : sort timeline items by date
check_view_rights : indicates whether current session rights should be checked for view rights
hide_private_items : force hiding private items (followup/tasks), even if session allow it

9.4.0
Renvoie
mixed[] Timeline items

restoreInputAndDefaults() restoreInputAndDefaultsCommonITILObject CommonITILObjectrestoreInputAndDefaults
restoreInputAndDefaults ( $ID, array & $options, ?array $overriden_defaults = null , bool $force_set_defaults = false )[protected]
Restores input, restores saved values, then sets the default options for any that are missing.
Paramètres
integer$ID
The item ID
array$options
ITIL Object options array passed to showFormXXXX functions. This is passed by reference and will be modified by this function.
?array$overriden_defaults
If specified, these values will be used as the defaults instead of the ones from the getDefaultValues() function.
bool$force_set_defaults
If true, the defaults are set for missing options even if the item is not new.
Renvoie
void
Voir également
getDefaultOptions()
restoreInput()
restoreSavedValues()
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :
setPredefinedFields() setPredefinedFieldsCommonITILObject CommonITILObjectsetPredefinedFields
setPredefinedFields (ITILTemplate $tt, array & $options, array $default_values)[protected]
Return an array of predefined fields from provided template Append also data to $options param (passed by reference) :
if we transform a ticket (form change and problem) or a problem (for change) override with its field
override form fields from template (ex: if content field is set in template, content field in option will be overriden)
if template changed (provided template doesn't match the one found in options), append a key _template_changed in $options
finally, append templates_id in options
Paramètres
ITILTemplate$tt
The ticket template to use
array$options
The current options array (PASSED BY REFERENCE)
array$default_values
The default values to use in case they are not predefined
Renvoie
array An array of the predefined values
